name: asset-store-fetcher-ui
description: A simple UI for the Asset Store Fetcher

scripts.update: start cmd /k npm run start --prefix asset-store-fetcher
scripts.app: npm run update && npm run ui
scripts.watch:update: start cmd /k npm run start-dev --prefix asset-store-fetcher
scripts.watch:app: npm run watch:update && npm run watch:ui

author: Caio Domingues
